title: Pukka: The Pup After Merle
description: Since the publication of the best-selling Merleâ s Door, Ted Kerasote has received thousands of e-mails asking two â Have you gotten another dog?â and â Are you writing a new book?â  The Pup After Merle answers both, in the most heartwarming way.
